welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dalupura, India! Known for its rich history and vibrant culture, this charming city is ready to enchant you. Explore our historical sites, immerse yourself in the local traditions, and enjoy all that Dalupura has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and most modern terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 45 minutes after providing their mobile number and receiving a verification code.
